solution.text: We do not experience the effect of atmospheric pressure because the pressure inside our bodies is equal to the atmospheric pressure and cancels the pressure from outside.

content.text: The air exerts a huge amount of atmospheric pressure on us. But we do not experience its effect because _____ .

incorrect.text: the pressure inside our body is more than the atmospheric pressure
the surface area of our body is large enough to annul the effect of the pressure

correct.text: the pressure inside our body is equivalent to the atmospheric pressure
